name: にちか
text: 奈落
trans: The Abyss.

name: にちか
text:
ステージの下
客席のざわめきをいちばん感じる場所
trans:
The basement below the stage.
The place where you can feel the excitement of the
audience the most.

name: にちか
text: ここを上がったら、ひとりになる
trans: The moment you rise above it, you'll be all alone.

name: 美琴
text: 奈落
trans: The Abyss.

name: 美琴
text:
見上げる場所
始める場所
trans:
The place you look upwards from.
The place where you begin.

name: 美琴
text: ここを上がった時のために、全てがある
trans: Everything exists for the moment you rise above it.

name: お笑い１
text:
────こんな時だからさ
感性を研ぎ澄ませることが必要だと思うわけ、俺は
trans:
────It's times like this, you know?
When I think we need to expand our horizons.

name: お笑い２
text:
なんなんだよおまえ急に。あと
『こんな時だから』ってよく聞くけどどんな時なんだよ！
trans:
What's this all of a sudden? Also...
You're always saying "times like this", but what
"time" do you even mean by that, anyway!

name: お笑い１
text: な！　今から感性研ぎ澄ませるからついてきてくれ！
trans:
Look! I'm trying to start on expanding our horizons,
so please work with me here!

name: お笑い２
text:
な！　じゃねーよ、質問無視かよ
まぁいいや研ぎ澄ませるのね？　じゃはい、どうぞ
trans:
"Look", my butt! Don't ignore my question.
Well whatever, you wanna expand your horizons?
Then, expand them yourself!

name: お笑い１
text: ハァァァ……ッ────
trans: Hrghhh...────

name: お笑い２
text:
は？　何！
感性っておまえ気合いで研ぎ澄ます感じ！？
trans:
Huh! The heck is that meant to be!
It looks more like the horizons are the ones
expanding you!?

name: お笑い１
text:
ドゥン！　シュゥゥ…………！
──やぁ、感性の鈍麻した人間。僕に何か用かな
trans:
Twuuun! Shwoop...!
──Hey there, person who hasn't expanded their
horizons. The heck you want?

name: お笑い２
text:
用はねーよ！　突然出てきてなんなんだよ
自称『感性研ぎ澄まされてる』失礼なやつ出てきたよ！
trans:
Nothing! Why are you acting like that.
For someone who claims to have expanded their
horizons, you're darn rude!

name: にちか
text: ……はー
trans: ...Ughhh.

name: にちか
text:
────なんかベタだなー
個性ないし、500万回見たことあるし
trans:
────What a predictable act.
Not a scrap of originality, and I've seen the same
jokes five million times before.

name: お笑い１
text:
……ダメじゃね？　なんか
ギャグ入れよ、もたねーって。ボケわかりづらいし
trans:
...Maye we should rethink this bit? I dunno.
It seems pointless to add a punchline, and it's kinda
hard to riff off of.

name: お笑い２
text:
感性研ぎ澄ませるとこの流れでなんか、一発
『ハァァ……ッ、ぴょぷぷー！』みたいなさぁ────
trans:
Maybe after the expanding our horizons part you
could suddenly shout, "Hrghhh... Pyopupu!", or
something like that────

name: にちか
text:
あー
ギャグに逃げるんだ……
trans:
Ugh.
Can you even call that a joke...

name: にちか
text:
テクニックないですって感じだもんなー
めっちゃめちゃさえないし──
trans:
They've got no sense of finesse, not to mention
that the whole routine is about to put me to sleep.

name: お笑い１
text:
────もういいってー……メシいこ！
腹減った
trans:
────Let's call it quits for now...
We should get some grub! I'm famished.

name: お笑い２
text: は？　じゃいつ仕上げんだよこのネタ
trans:
Huh?
Then how are we gonna get this gag sorted out?

name: お笑い１
text:
餃子食べたらー
な！　俺ビール280円のクーポンあるから
trans:
Maybe if we ate some gyoza, we could.
Look! I've got a ¥280 off coupon.

name: お笑い２
text:
な！　じゃねーよ
……まぁいいや餃子ね？
trans:
"Look", my butt! 
...Oh whatever, gyoza it is.

name: お笑い１
text: おほほ、さすが相方
trans: Ohoho, that's my partner!

name: にちか
text: ……最悪
trans: ...Terrible.

name: にちか
text: 絶っ対そのまま帰ってゲームして寝る
trans:
I just know they're actually gonna go straight home,
play some video games, and sleep.

name: バイト先の先輩
text:
──にっちー
お疲れー。休憩ー？
trans:
──Nicchii.
Hey there. You on break?

name: にちか
text:
……あっ、先輩。お疲れ様です！
シフトこれからです？
trans:
...Oh, senpai. Hello!
My shift is about to start, actually?

name: バイト先の先輩
text:
そー
てか超コワい顔してんじゃん、何
trans:
Gotcha.
Anyway, uh, you're makin' a real scary face.
What's buggin' ya?

name: にちか
text: えっ、やめてくださいよめちゃめちゃ普通ですよー！
trans:
Hey, please don't say that!
I look really really normal right now!

name: バイト先の先輩
text: えー？　普通怖っ
trans:
Huuuh?
Well, your "normal" is downright scary.

name: お笑い１＆お笑い２
text: ぎゃはは……！
trans: Gyahaha...!

name: にちか
text:
……んんー！　なんか、
すっごいレベル低くてダサいコンビがそこで練習してて！
trans:
...Nhhh! It's just like, there's this super lame and
unfunny comedy duo practicing their routine over
there!

name: バイト先の先輩
text:
は、それだけ？
いいじゃん、大体ダサいじゃんあのへんで練習してるやつ
trans:
Whaaa, that's it?
C'mon, who cares, like all the duos who practice their
routines 'round here are that level of lame.

name: にちか
text:
そうですけど……ムカついてきません！？
絶対お手洗い借りるためだけにうちの店入ってくるタイプ！
trans:
You're not wrong, but... don't they piss you off!?
They're totally the type who comes into our store
just to use the bathroom!

name: お笑い２
text:
──じゃー、こんな時だからさぁ
おまえのおごりな、今日
trans:
──Anyhoo, at times like this, you know?
I'll be expect you to foot the bill today.

name: お笑い１
text:
は？　感性研ぎ澄ませろよ
俺今日クーポンと700円しかねーから！
trans:
Hah? Well you'll have to expand your horizons.
Cuz, I got nothing but this coupon and ¥700 to my
name!

name: お笑い２
text: ぎゃははっ
trans: Gyahaha.

name: にちか
text: ……ほんと最悪
trans: ...Just terrible.

name: バイト先の先輩
text: いくよー、にっちー？
trans: Nicchii, you comin'?

name: にちか
text: ────あっ、はい！
trans: ────Uh, yeah!

name: ダンストレーナー
text:
はーい、長丁場お疲れ様！
今日はここまで。よく頑張ったわね
trans:
Alright, let's call it for today!
This was a lengthy lesson, and you both worked hard.

name: にちか＆美琴
text: ありがとうございました！
trans: Thank you very much!

name: にちか
text:
……あ、あの
美琴さんも、ありがとうございました……！
trans:
...U-um...
Thank you very much too, Mikoto-san...!

name: 美琴
text:
うん
お疲れ様
trans:
Yeah.
Good work today.

name: にちか
text:
は、はい……！　結構、遅くなっちゃいましたよね……！
美琴さん、お腹空いてたりしません？
trans:
Y-you too...!
You know, it's gotten pretty late, hasn't it...?
Are you feeling hungry at all, Mikoto-san?

name: 美琴
text: ああ……
trans: Ah...

name: にちか
text:
あっ、あの私……！
近くの中華屋さんのクーポンあるんですよー！
trans:
U-uh, so as it turns out...!
I've got a coupon for that Chinese place nearby!

name: 美琴
text: そうなんだ
trans: I see.

name: にちか
text: はいー！
trans: Yes!

name: 美琴
text:
私もう少しやっていくから
お疲れ様
trans:
I think I'll practice a little longer.
So I'll see you later, then.

name: にちか
text:
────！
あー……！　じゃあ……私ももう少し────
trans:
────!
Um...! In that case, I'll stay here and────

name: にちか
text:
──つるんでるのがコンビだって思ってるんだったら
早いうちに解散した方がいいですよねー
trans:
If they think being a duo is all about hanging out
together, then they should just disband already.

name: バイト先の先輩
text:
あははっ、まだ言ってんのー？
いつからお笑い評論家になったんだ、にっちーよ
trans:
Ahaha, you're still stuck on that?
Since where did ya become a comedy critic, Nicchi?

name: にちか
text: ……っ、そんなんじゃないですけどー！
trans: ...I mean, that's not really my angle here!

name: にちか
text:
お腹空かせてやってたら、お邪魔ですよねー……！
私、帰って、振りのおさらいしますね！
trans:
If I try to practice on an empty stomach, I'll just get
in the way, won't I...!
So I'll go on home and review the routine there!

name: 美琴
text: そう
trans: Right.

name: にちか
text:
はい！
それじゃ、失礼します！
trans:
Yes!
Well, I'll be going then!

name: 美琴
trans: ────Hey, actually.

name: にちか
text:
……！
は、はい……っ
trans:
...!
W-what is it...?

name: 美琴
text:
次のレッスンの前に、
もう一回合わせる時間あるかな
trans:
Do you think you'll have time to meet again to go
over the routine, before we have our next lesson?

name: にちか
text:
……あー！
はい！　もちろんです！　いつがいいです？
trans:
...Oh! Yes! Of course!
When would be best?

name: 美琴
text:
早い方がいいかな……
スケジュール確認して、プロデューサーに送っておくね
trans:
The earlier the better, probably...
I'll look over my schedule, and let Producer know.

name: にちか
text:
あ、はい！
私もすぐに送っておきます！
trans:
Oh, yes!
I'll contact him immediately as well!

name: にちか
text: お互いに緊張感もまったくないし！
trans: I mean, they're so comfortable with each other!

name: にちか
text:
食べることとか休憩とかにだらだら時間使って、
結局仕上がらないー、みたいなのが────
trans:
And if they're wasting their time on frivolous stuff
like eating and taking breaks together, they'll never
get their routine in order, you know what I mean...?

name: にちか
text: バカだなーって
trans: It's stupid of them, I think.

name: お笑い１＆お笑い２
text: イエー
trans: Yaaay!

name: バイト先の先輩
text:
あははっ、なんかやっぱりやばいって！
キレすぎキレすぎ
trans:
Ahaha, I was right to call ya scary!
You're bein' way too harsh.

name: にちか
text:
えーっ
先輩もあれ見てたら絶対そう思いますってー！
trans:
Ehhh?
If you saw them, you'd feel the same way for sure.

name: バイト先の先輩
text:
えー？
いやーべつに何の感情も湧かないけど……
trans:
Huh?
Not really, watchin' 'em I felt pretty ambivalent...

name: バイト先の先輩
text:
……まぁ、そっかぁ
にっちーもそうだもんね、もう
trans:
...But hey, I see the deal.
You'd know more about duos than me, wouldn't ya.

name: バイト先の先輩
text: シーズだもんね、にっちーは
trans: You've got SHHis now.

name: にちか
text: そ、それじゃ失礼しまーす！
trans: W-well, I'll be heading out then!

name: お笑い１
text:
俺らさ、売れたら買おうぜ。餃子ー
な！
trans:
Hey how about this, once we make it?
I'll make sure to buy you gyoza then.

name: お笑い２
text:
は？　だから『な！』じゃねーから
餃子今でもクーポンで買えるわ
trans:
Huh? Whaddya mean, "then".
We can buy gyoza right now, with the coupon.

name: お笑い１
text:
ちがーう、餃子の店ごとー！
俺CEO、おまえセンムとかでいいから
trans:
Nooo, I meant buy us a gyoza shop of our own!
I'll be the CEO, and you can be the president.

name: お笑い２
text: おお！？
trans: Oooh!?

name: にちか
text:
そ、そうですよー……
こっちは評価高い実力派ユニットなのでー！
trans:
T-that's exactly right...
See, SHHis is a high level unit with genuine talent!

name: にちか
text: ああいう中途半端な感じ許せないんですよねー！
trans:
In SHHis, that kind of half-baked performance
would never be allowed!

name: お笑い２
text: やべー！　CEOっつったらタワマン住めるじゃん
trans:
Dang! If you became CEO, then we could move into
one of those fancy high rises.

name: お笑い１
text:
な！　再来年くらいまでには賞獲りたいー
獲ったら引越しね
trans:
Look! We could try to win some comedy awards by
the year after next. If we win, we could move.

name: お笑い２
text:
な！　の意味わかんねーけど
ま、そーね。再来年くらいには２LDK住んでたいかなぁ
trans:
I still dunno what you mean by "Look!", but...
Sure, by then I'd at least like to move to a 2LDK.

name: お笑い１
text:
しゃー、じゃまず餃子食おう
ぴょぷぷ～～！
trans:
Whew. Well first, let's eat some gyoza.
Pyopupu～～

name: バイト先の先輩
text:
はいはい
んじゃ、気持ち切り替えてー
trans:
I gotcha, I gotcha.
Aight, it's time to move on and get ready to work.

name: バイト先の先輩
text:
いくらバック業務に異動したからってさぁ
そんな顔で作業されるとこっちもサガるわー
trans:
Even if we keep ya off the sales floor, workin' with
that attitude will just bring the rest of us down.

name: にちか
text:
……っ
は、はい……！　それはわかってますー……！
trans:
...Guh.
R-right...! I know that...!

name: にちか
text:
……
売れるな、ばーか
trans:
...
So stupid. I hope you never make it.

name: お笑い１＆お笑い２
text: ぎゃはは……！
trans: Gyahaha...!

name: プロデューサー
text: にちかは、幸せになるんだ
trans: You'll find your happiness, Nichika.

name: にちか
text:
絶対売れるな
幸せにもなるな
trans:
Don't ever make it.
Don't ever find happiness, either.

name: にちか
text: ばーか
trans: So stupid.
